testcase.classname: Feature to test Jiva design Merchandising T and A Data Entry screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test the Filter Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then click on the Merchandising Module......................................passed And Click on the T and A Module.............................................passed And Click on the Merchandising T&A Data Entry Screen........................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed And Click on the Filter Icon................................................passed And Click on the Buyer Field................................................passed And Click on the Season Field...............................................passed And Select the Season.......................................................passed And Select the Month........................................................passed And Search The IPO and Style................................................passed And Click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO and Style................................................passed
